description: Known sprite locations for various SNES ROMs

sprites._note: Additional sprites found at offsets: 0x1A8002, 0x318002, 0x3A0001, 0x210002 with quality 0.81-0.85

offset_variants._note: Europe/Fun Pak ROM has different sprite locations than USA version

scanning_hints.description: Tips for finding actual sprite data in ROMs
hints: Real sprite data should decompress to multiples of 32 bytes (8x8 tiles in 4bpp)
Character sprites typically show recognizable forms when converted to images
Sprite data often has moderate entropy (not too random, not too uniform)
Look for data that produces coherent tile patterns, not random pixels
Kirby sprites should show round body shapes, faces, and character features
Quality scores above 0.80 typically indicate valid sprite data
Offsets at round addresses (0x200000, 0x378000) are common for sprite data
